mapper.select: select organization_id as id, organization_name as name, organization_code as code, parent_id as "parentId", iorder from sys_organization so where 1=1 [[ and so.organization_id not in(#notInIds#) ]] [[ and so.organization_id in(#inIds#) ]] order by iorder

select organization_id as id, organization_name as name, organization_code as code, parent_id as "parentId", iorder, 1 as itype from sys_organization so union all select su.id, su.username as name, su.loginname code, suo.organization_id as "parentId", 0 iorder, 2 as itype from sys_user su left join sys_user_organization suo on su.id = suo.user_id
order by itype,iorder
